casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Smith, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Smith, 105 Ohio St.3d 289, 2005-Ohio-1651.]

(No. 2004-2152 Submitted March 8, 2005 Decided April 20, 2005.)

{¶ 1} The discretionary appeal is accepted.

{¶ 2} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for resentencing consistent with State v. Jordan, 104 Ohio St.3d 21, 2004-Phio-6085, 817 N.E.2d 864.

*290William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Lisa Reitz Williamson, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur. Lanzinger, J., dissents.
